channel.title: Making a Copy of an Item? (718)

item.title: Making a Copy of an Item? (718)
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

[quote=“RandQm, post:3, topic:549420”]Hardcoded you would get the client data for the item and add it your itemdef class (client sided) and give it the id you want.
But I can’t help you a lot with that as I never used 718[/quote]
Yeah, I can tell you haven’t…

Afaik: 718 has JAGGRAB. You do not need to edit the client sided data… You edit the item in the cache, pack the cache again, and restart the server + client. When the client reloads it grabs the latest cache, the cache with your new item.

From there it’s just making it work like a regular item…

http://www.rune-server.org/runescape-development/rs-503-client-server/tutorials/495026-718-how-add-custom-items.html

Read full topic
item.source: Making a Copy of an Item? (718)
